import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Url } from '../models/url.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-upsert-dialog', templateUrl: './upsert-dialog.component.html', styleUrls: ['./upsert-dialog.component.css'], providers: [], }) export class UpsertDialogComponent { url: Url; showModal: boolean = false; //@Output() updateListEvent = new EventEmitter(); constructor() {} displayModal() { console this.showModal = !this.showModal; } addNewTask() { this.showModal = !this.showModal; } }
